name: Thoughtful Horrors
description:
Run through your mind! none of that is real. All you see here is your biggest nightmare. Try to get away from your fate which might hate, but you have to pave a way for yourself. Can you save yourself from the atmosphere that breeds danger? Run through the mayhem to get to your own world. (Fullscreen highly recommended)

Credits:

ARTWORK:  TheZynec

PROGRAMMING:  Sathya Narayanan

This is a game made in just 2 days. I know that the jam gave 7 days to complete the game. But due to exams, we had only 2 days to complete the game. So unlike others, we created this game in 2 days. Please show your support by rating the project and commenting on the feedback. If you're participating in the jam, Best of luck.

If the game freezes, click on the game and it should start.

CONTROLS:
WASD or ARROW KEYS to move and SPACE to jump

DISCLAIMER: EXTREME DIFFICULTY.
